p: Since the first COVID-19 case in Wuhan, China, the pandemic caused by SARS-CoV-2 has caused more than 162 million cases and 3.3 million deaths globally. According to official records, the first case of COVID-19 in Chile was reported on 3 March 2020. Since then, by May 2021, more than 1,500,000 cases and around 172,000 deaths occurred in Chile [1].
